items.title: Sarah Mullally named first woman Archbishop of Canterbury
items.description: Sarah Mullally has been named as the new Archbishop of Canterbury, becoming the first woman to be chosen to lead the world's 85 million Anglicans.

items.title: Shutdown postpones monthly jobs report. And, Trump dangles a carrot to colleges
items.description: The government shutdown has delayed the monthly jobs report. And, the White House pressures colleges to sign a 'compact' aligning with Trump's agenda.

items.description: Officials said one of the men killed at the Heaton Park Congregation synagogue in northwestern England had been hit by police gunfire.
